game.name: PICO PARK 2
game.categories: Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Shared/Split Screen Co-op, Shared/Split Screen, Cross-Platform Multiplayer, Steam Achievements, Partial Controller Support, Steam Cloud, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: PICO PARK가 아주 새로운 스테이지와 함께 돌아왔습니다! 이 협동 액션 퍼즐 게임에서 플레이어 2~8인과 로컬이나 온라인에서 플레이하세요!
game.shortDescriptionEn: PICO PARK is back with all new levels! Play with 2-8 players locally or online in this co-op action-puzzle game!

reviewHighlights.text: This game makes you realise how little brain capacity some of your friends have. Overall pretty fun, reccomend
No creature under God's divine light can replicate the sounds I make playing this game.
